idea: Picado Home is a rapidly growing E-commerce Start-up with multiple brands designed to keep customers happy with wide-ranging products and restful sleep. We only use sustainable raw materials to craft affordable luxury collections to keep our planet safe. Our products are designed in-house and brought exclusively from manufacturing units and sold directly to the customers. Our happy customer approach ensures our consumer enjoys more savings as the costly layers of agency and middle man are removed. We are expanding to new markets, earning awards, and setting new benchmarks for the industry.
name: PICADO HOME DECORS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
We are a biomechanical technology-driven company with a prime focus on musculoskeletal and neurological fitness.

Our core purpose is to transform the physical rehabilitation and fitness sector by developing robotic assistive technologies. We serve hospitals, orthopedic centers, rehab clinics, fitness centres and old age homes to take over their repetitive tasks and exercises for recovery and daily life. This empowers the caregivers to provide objective, data backed, controlled treatment to patients.

Our motto is to realize optimum efficiency and high productivity in the physical healthcare sector. Backed by independent studies and based on accepted sciences, supported by clinical protocols and normative data, we offer pioneering breakthroughs in neurological and musculoskeletal rehabilitative technology. For patients, our technology provides fast, effective and documented return to function while in turn reducing the effort and increasing efficiency of caregivers. We further aim to lower the overall cost of providing physical rehabilitative healthcare.


To know more, https://www.forhealth.co.in/
name: SH FORHEALTH SOLUTIONS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
"GoEifo" an Adventure Travel Company

Focuses on adventure enthusiast and arrange travel for adventure travellers
name: GOEIFO LEISURE TRAVELS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Greetings from “Engrity Global Services”

We are providing services like Inspection, NDT, Technical Consultant, Manpower supply –outsourcing and training –Certification as clients requirement in various industries. Our all staff are well qualified, skilled and experienced.
name: Engrity Global Services

idea:
PARNA has been at the forefront of the retail market across the globe. For your all products need, we’ll work with you to provide you with the best deal around.


Our team of experts has the local knowledge, skills and experience to help you through what would otherwise be a very stressful buying process. 

​


PARNA way of working includes:


​

1) Costing and negotiating with factory for the specific product. Finalizing cost and sending it to buyer.


​


2) Assistance in development of samples and sending it to buyer.


​


3) Getting the agreement closed with transparent payment terms.


​


4) Coordinating with buyer for QC and guiding manufacturers for smooth processing.


​


5) Collection of the all final Invoice, other requirements from buyer and closing the shipment.
name: PARNA TRADERS

idea: FACTS is a Software Development company in Mumbai, India. It was established in the year 2015. FACTS has developed huge acclamations for its works from its esteemed clients, within a short period of time.FACTS has successfully established its strong foothold in the Indian as well as overseas markets with its highest standards of service delivery and customer satisfaction.FACTS is particularly well efficient in giving the desired forms to the marketing efforts by various professionals using websites and other web based tools. Creativity, Speed of service delivery, Accuracy and highest level of customer support has always been the well cherished attributes of facts.
name: FACTS ONLINE PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: A leading provider of subsea services to the oil and gas industry, we are principally engaged in subsea intervention and engineering services in support of the Construction and IRM activities for offshore structures including pipelines, flow lines, cables, fixed platforms, drilling rigs, SBM and FPSO systems. WE ARE SUBSEA TECHNOLOGY.
name: SUBSEA TECHNOLOGY LLP

idea: Renao is an engineering start-up that specializes in the manufacturing, supply and maintenance of Industrial Baking equipment across the country. It was founded in 2020 by a diverse group of mechanical engineers with years of experience and expertise in machine design and development. With knowledge of various industries, they’ve brought their love for business and machine design into Renao Manufacturing. Our mission is to manufacture and deliver innovative, reliable & quality products to SMEs helping them magnifying their production output. We have an ever-expanding portfolio of equipment that is unmatched in terms of quality and will streamline the production and lower the operating costs dramatically.
name: RENAO MANUFACTURING PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Our company is a leading export company, exporting Indian spices, nuts, vegetables, handicrafts and coir-based products. Having ventured into the activity of export and import, the organization has emerged as one of the key players in exporting agro based commodities based on the requirement of clients. We deal into wide range of products such as Indian Spices, Indian Herbs, Dry Fruits, Nuts-Nuts Products, Fresh Fruits, Fresh Vegetables, Natural Honey, Healthy Millets and Handicraft Products. We are one of the most recognized export companies to export Indian food products all over the globe. We are servicing for the spices, herbs, dry fruits, natural honey, and handicraft care clients who require import and export business in India. Our product line with unparalleled quality is in accordance with clients’ requirements and conforms to global standards. Hi-Tech standards, service reliability and commitment to excellence make us a leader in export & import business. We are certified by Spices Board of India to export Indian spices to world-wide nations without compromising on the standards. Our management strives to set benchmark for efficiency in executing spice business and sterilize spices to control micro contamination up-to the required levels. We are assured about the prompt delivery and quality of products. The firm is also certified by ‘Agricultural and process food products export development authority’ of India for exporting fresh fruits, fresh vegetables, Condiments and other Indian food products all over the world. We are engaged in exporting a range of food and other products across the globe, by allowing sustainable development to drive our services, we meet customer needs. Our organization strives to achieve the confidence of our buyers, by providing them the quality products at ‘cost-benefit’ basis. The firm strongly believes in teamwork because it reduces the time and effort in any business and optimizes the business opportunity. Our company executes services at par with international standards and deal in distributing agro based products based on ‘Best value for money” basis and are looking to expand our servicing areas. We ensure smooth supply of quality agro products as well as we also ensure that both our buyers and suppliers are time tested, authentic and capable in terms of their commercial capacity as well as financial and economic standing in the market.
name: AXIA INTERGLOBAL LLP

idea:
We have build an Application (Mobile & Web) with to promote Ecosystem of Hyperlocal Network naming "ZIPCODE".


We are connecting Residents (i.e. Housing Societies/ Residential Societies/ Commercial Complexes) with Local Retailer/ Local Retails shops & Local Service Provider. 


The Applications serves following purpose:

1. Community based group and individual chat system & Games within the residential societies/ residential complex/ commercial complex.

2. Connecting Houses with Local Shop Owners/ Retailers/ Local Service Provider for cost effective and quick availability.

3. Advertisement/ Marketing platform to all retailers/ Small Shopkeepers and efforts to organize sales.
name: Vaircom Private Limited
